Description: This role is for a Subject Matter Expert related to corporate regulatory requirements that include Enterprise Risk Management, Data Protection and Environmental Management as a minimum. include:·Coordinating and Maintaining the Enterprise Risk Register for Ground Services ensuring the full and complete internal Enterprise Risk Management process is met with set deadlines.·Support the Standards & Compliance manager in identifying critical and common enterprise risks, review control effectiveness, root causes and consequences, propose control measures and track, manage ground services enterprise risks.·Assess the existing business processes for the department and highlight gaps, areas of improvement and develop processes if required to drive corporate regulatory compliance within the business.·Facilitate and track Data Protection Impact Assessments for existing or new processes to be established within Ground Services.·Maintain the Record of Processing Activities for Ground Services division as per the applicable data protection regulations.·Maintain the Environmental Management process defined for Ground Services which includes coordination with all stakeholders within ground services for conducting environmental aspects and impact assessments and meeting the set deadlines.·Consistent checks on updates related to internal/external publication/regulation, prepare and issue bulletins where applicable in consultation with the Standards and Compliance Manager·Responsible  for  issuing,   updating  and  keeping  track  of document  versions  of TYPE  3 documentation.·Maintaining records of changes in standards and compliance related regulatory requirements, issue bulletins and other related documents.·Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders for standards and compliance relevant system enhancements.·Publish respective Quick Reference Guides, Briefing sheets and any other required documents to drive compliance.  ·Is the SME and point of contact for all related COVID-19 travel requirement enquires.
